alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson County through 315 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dexter, or 10 miles northwest of Watertown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Fort Drum, Dexter, Glen Park, Black River, Brownville, Chaumont, Evans Mills, Calcium, Perch Lake, Rutland Center, Depauville and Perch River. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 45 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
